title: Was permabanned?Unfairly?
body:
So i created my account named;rometr5 in 2013 and i went trough my email and saw i had gotten some emails about the account  that i got suspension and chat restrictions but i didint remeber them so i tought i should play League again because some of my friends are playing it too.I did start playing the game and i recived a 14 day suspension after 1 month of playing cuz yes i flamed on somebody but i learned that it wont help my teammates and i didint do it after the suspension but another day i had velkoz who repeated to say Report panth and another game where lux said the same thing but i wasent doing anything wrong.After the lux game i was searching for a game and then when i looked at the screen it saied to me= This account has been banned the client will exit now, But the thing is when i logged on again i got message that my recent report was issued wich was lux i bet and that i was permabanned from 3 *Toxic* games. I mean if u guess that saying Idiot,noob,bad and fcking idiot is toxic behaivor then i dont know what to belive. There were several games between those 3 games and i did not say anything bad to other players when we were losing (I won 6 ranked in a row and lost 7 in a row). But the point is that if i created the account 2013 and i got suspensions in 2013 wich i dont even remeber then doesnt it reset after a while??? I got no warning before 14 day suspension or no chat restrictions so what the hell? I mean i think i wasent toxic in the games but i think riot thinks i was.Here are the game logs:killerteam: olaf babysit me

replies.body:
While Necromancy may be handy (and sometimes needed) in video games, it's not the case for old forum threads. Please avoid using such magic and be mindful of how old threads are before posting.

Feel free to contact us at the [Moderation Discord](https://discordapp.com/channels/230113905668653056/306220435262144512) or at [Discuss the Boards]( https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/community-moderation) for any questions, comments or concerns about this. Thank you and have a good day.

Your punishment tiers only drop when you are actively playing games so that you cant just juggle accounts until the punishments wear off to avoid being banned.

Basically, for your punishment tier to drop you have to be actively playing without being toxic over a period of time.

The amount of time you threatened Lux that she will get banned is insane. She probably laughed her ass off when she got message that u got banned.

This ban is completely deserved. Without a doubt. You are very very toxic and game would be much better without people like u.
He said it to me all the game that i will get banned i just said sometimes in responses that he will get banned not me{{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}
yikes. didn't know it was a repeated offense. watch out bro.

Time passed between punishments does not matter if you were not playing games. The account was considered toxic and on thin ice, and it never showed any reform. Sure maybe like you said, what 13 games? Sorry, couldn't really follow the timeline. But yeah, you only had a small amount of games played between punishments, so of course you didn't go down in punishment tiers.
After your 14 day ban you are on thin ice. Any harassment will get you a perma.
